subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Charlotte Bobcats, who selected Cody, the youngest of the three Zellers, with the No. 4 pick in Thursday’s draft, will be hoping they have the right brother.
snippet: The Charlotte Bobcats, who selected Cody, the youngest of the three Zellers, with the No. 4 pick in Thursday’s draft, will be hoping they have the right brother.
